## Color4.(constructor)

Creates a new Color4 object from red, green, blue values, all between 0 and 1

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(
    r?: number, 
    g?: number, 
    b?: number, 
    a?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  r | <code>number</code> | defines the red component (between 0 and 1, default is 0) |
|  g | <code>number</code> | defines the green component (between 0 and 1, default is 0) |
|  b | <code>number</code> | defines the blue component (between 0 and 1, default is 0) |
|  a | <code>number</code> | defines the alpha component (between 0 and 1, default is 1) |
